mapper.sql: contract, project, name, txcount, abi, code, createtime, auditflag, updatetime, contactinfo, type, description, logo, creator, addresscount, ontcount, ongcount
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_ont_contracts
contract,
name,
project,
txcount,
abi,
code,
createtime,
auditflag,
updatetime,
contactinfo,
type,
description,
logo,
creator,
addresscount,
ontcount,
ongcount,

mapper.update:
update tbl_ont_contracts
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
project = #{project,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
txcount = #{txcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
abi = #{abi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
auditflag = #{auditflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
contactinfo = #{contactinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addresscount = #{addresscount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ontcount = #{ontcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ongcount = #{ongcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where contract = #{contract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tbl_ont_contracts set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},project = #{project,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, txcount = #{txcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, abi = #{abi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, auditflag = #{auditflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contactinfo = #{contactinfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addresscount = #{addresscount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ontcount = #{creator,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ongcount = #{creator,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where contract = #{contract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_ont_contracts where auditflag = 1
select creator from tbl_ont_contracts where contract = #{param1}

select contract as ContractHash, Project, Name, TxCount, ABI, Code, CreateTime, ContactInfo, UpdateTime, Logo, Description, Creator, AddressCount, OntCount, OngCount,Type from tbl_ont_contracts where auditflag = 1 order by createtime DESC limit #{Start}, #{PageSize}
select * from tbl_ont_contracts where auditflag = 1 order by createtime DESC
select * from tbl_ont_contracts where auditflag = 1 and project = #{project} order by createtime DESC

select contract as ContractHash, Name, TxCount, ABI, Code, CreateTime, ContactInfo, UpdateTime, Logo, Description, Creator, AddressCount, OntCount, OngCount,Type from tbl_ont_contracts where auditflag = 1 order by createtime DESC limit #{Start}, #{PageSize}

select contract as ContractHash, Name, TxCount, ABI, Code, CreateTime, ContactInfo, UpdateTime, Logo, Description, Creator, AddressCount, OntCount, OngCount,Type from tbl_ont_contracts order by createtime DESC
